courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, intervals, chords, and rhythm. Perfect for beginners!

courses.title: Mastering the Guitar: Beginner to Pro
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to mastering the guitar, covering techniques, music theory, and performance tips.

courses.title: Piano Essentials: From Basics to Performance
courses.description: Learn piano from the ground up with a course designed to take you from basic scales to performance pieces.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Dive into the world of electronic music production, learning tools like Ableton and FL Studio to create your own tracks.

courses.title: Vocal Training: Techniques for Singers
courses.description: A specialized course for singers, focusing on vocal warm-ups, pitch control, breathing techniques, and performance.
